attributes.action: St Ambrose RC Primary School improve road safety.
attributes.additional_details:
Improve road safety around St Ambrose RC Primary School

Responsible department: Department for Transport

The parents of St Ambrose Primary RC School and residents of the surrounding area petition Stockport metropolitan County Council to further improve the safety of the roads around the school.
A) More Signage erected around the school warning cars to slow down, indicating that children are crossing, and that vehicles are warned that they are approaching a school. b) Consideration of a Zebra crossing outside the gates/entrance of the school.
